10.1007/978-3-031-13643-6_12.title: Analysing Moral Beliefs for Detecting Hate Speech Spreaders on Twitter
10.1007/978-3-031-13643-6_12.author: Lai, Mirko and Stranisci, Marco Antonio and Bosco, Cristina and Damiano, Rossana and Patti, Viviana
10.1007/978-3-031-13643-6_12.paperMotivationText: The goal of this paper is to understand which components of their model were helpful in their submission to the PAN 2021 shared task on Profiling Hate Speech Spreaders on Twitter.
10.1007/978-3-031-13643-6_12.paperContributionText: This paper describes a submission to the PAN 2021 shared task on Profiling Hate Speech Spreaders on Twitter. They investigate the helpfulness of integrating moral values information into the HS spreader classifier. They also investigate which moral values correlate with HS spreader labels.
10.1007/978-3-031-13643-6_12.paperResultsText: The use of moral values information to train the classifier (transfer learning from MFTC and using word counts from MFD) is helpful for hatespeech spreader classification.
